messages.title: Standing Up For South Manchester
messages.content: I've been your local voice in Parliament since 2015, when I was elected by the people of South Manchester. I’ve been working hard since then to stand up for our area, working hard on issues that matter to you.

messages.title: Fighting For Our Public Services
messages.content: I've consistently campaigned and voted to protect our local hospitals and the NHS. I have spoken out against cuts to our public services, and I've worked to ensure funding for our local schools.

messages.title: Your Voice in Westminster
messages.content: In Westminster, I have raised issues from South Manchester, worked on legislation, and stood up for your concerns.

messages.title: My pledge to you
messages.content: To fight the education cuts that will lose every school in South Manchester vital funding. To oppose the Tory hard Brexit, and to keep working hard all year round for the people of South Manchester.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight the education cuts that will lose every school in South Manchester vital funding.
Ensuring essential services are maintained, such as the NHS and local hospitals, and opposing cuts.

issues.education: Fight the education cuts that will lose every school in South Manchester vital funding.
issues.health: Consistently campaigned and voted to protect our local hospitals and the NHS.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for South Manchester
politicalExperience.achievements: Protected local hospitals, NHS, and public services; worked on legislation in Westminster.

contactInformation.address: Casework Team, FREEPOST RTJS-ZKLJ-BXXC, Manchester M20 3BN

endorsements.endorsement: Jeff has worked for the people of South Manchester over the last two years. He has been a passionate campaigner for fairness and for the NHS, and I’m delighted to have him standing for re-election.
Jeff has been a fantastic advocate for South Manchester and a committed campaigner for the NHS. I am proud to support him.
